attributes.additional_details: i want the government to create a fair treatment of people with fibro, i want to be able to speak with my doctor about the right meds and get the right meds for my condition with out being made to feel like a drug addict i also want fibro to be as recognised as other illnesses are. living with fibro really hurts day in and day out, what government wants their people to live  with this condition and not able to work because of it. we are not drug addicts or attention seekers we are people in pain, now help us to help you
